title: Indulgent chocolate truffle tiffin
ingredients: ['120g margarine or butter', '25g sugar', '1 tablespoon milk', '1 tablespoon golden syrup (or honey)', '250g broken biscuits (digestives or rich tea are the best)', '2 tablespoons drinking chocolate', '1 tablespoon cocoa powder', '50g raisins', '25g chopped glace cherries (optional)', '25g chopped nuts (optional)', '125g chocolate']
